sentence.Network_en: A similar rocky protrusion was noticed in the north apse.
sentence.Network_cn: 在北侧半圆壁龛另有一块相似的石头.

sentence.Network_en: In the left side, beginning with the apse, Argentina, Brasil, Chile and Mexico are represented.
sentence.Network_cn: 在左侧, 从半圆壁龛起, 有阿根廷 、 巴西 、 智利和墨西哥的标志.

sentence.Network_en: Quite by chance , an apse and some mosaic fragments were brought to light in 1891.
sentence.Network_cn: 1891年有些半圆壁龛的残片被发现.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (in sense 2): from Latin apsis (see apsis)

means.word_mean: 1. a domed or vaulted recess or projection on a building especially the east end of a church; usually contains the altar

auth_sentence.content: Their devotional focus is a large stupa, or mound, raised in honor of Buddha in the embracing apse.

auth_sentence.content: The prayer halls are appropriately austere—great rooms ending in a rounded apse and lined with a massive colonnade.
